listing.listing_description: This beautiful estate is nestled amid the Alexander Valley AVA in Sonoma County, just outside the town of Healdsburg and close to numerous renowned wineries. The vintage ranch house is ideal for a memorable getaway with loved ones, featuring a private outdoor swimming pool, beautiful alfresco living and dining areas, and luminous, superbly appointed interiors (including a gourmet kitchen and home office). Three ample bedrooms accommodate families, destination wedding guests, and groups of friends up to six in size.The estate offers a serene haven for carefree relaxation and festive delights in the heart California Wine Country. Enjoy long days and evenings on the pool terrace, swimming in the refreshing water, basking in the sun, and gathering in the lounge areas with glasses of local wine. Fire up the barbecue grill on the deck in the evening, and relish an alfresco meal at the table for eight.The interiors possess the quintessential Sonoma balance of rustic spirit and a welcoming, modern elegance. The open-concept living and dining room features a comfy lounge with large TV, a sitting area by the fireplace, and a beautiful table for six. Cooks will adore the bright and airy kitchen, with ample prep space, an island breakfast bar, top-of-the-line appliances, and a farmhouse-style table. Excellent media features include Apple TV and Sonos sound. Central air conditioning and heating keep you comfortable in all seasons.The bedrooms are furnished with an uncluttered simplicity, featuring comfortable bedding, serene natural light, and evocative touches of artwork and décor. The master bedroom includes a king bed and a spacious bathroom with dual vanity, walk-in shower, and lovely clawfoot soaking tub. There is one guest suite with a king bed and one with a queen; both enjoy ensuite bathrooms, and the queen suite opens to a private, screened-in terrace.The Healdsburg area includes three renowned wine producing AVAs—Alexander Valley, Russian River, and Dry Creek—and several of the top wineries in North America. You're also an easy drive to Santa Rosa, featuring fabulous cultural attractions, restaurants, and markets. The beaches at Bodega Bay are within comfortable driving distance.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Red rocks stretch behind and the brilliant blue sea spreads out in front of Casa Escarpa. From the villa’s setting in The Corridor of Los Cabos, you’ll enjoy panoramic views, plus a location close to several beaches, golf and more. Spacious indoor and outdoor areas and three bedrooms make this Cabo Colorado vacation rental perfect for a small family, a group of friends or even a sun-drenched Mexico honeymoon.The villa feels like your own private luxury resort, with an infinity pool facing the Sea of Cortez, a hot tub, al-fresco lounging and dining areas, a barbecue and a firepit. After sunset, play a few games inside on the ping-pong table, unwind with the help of the TV and sound system, or post a few snaps of your holiday via Wi-Fi.Step from the terrace through fold-away glass doors and into rooms with classic Cabo appeal, from the free-flowing layout to the generous use of serene natural tones. A comfortable sitting area around the TV, dining table for eight and a breakfast area in the fully equipped kitchen provide ample room to stretch out.Casa Escarpa has one master suite with a king bed and its own balcony, as well as two bedrooms with queen beds and views of the Sea of Cortez. All three bedrooms have en-suite bathrooms, air conditioning and ceiling fans.The casa is just a short drive from the beaches of Costa Azul, Chileno and Santa Maria Bay, as well as the Cabo Del Sol golf course. Take a day trip to famous Lovers Beach (or a boat trip to Divorce Beach), then follow up with an evening out in lively Cabo San Lucas. Or take a gallery walk around romantic San Jose del Cabo, followed by a multi-course dinner at one of the town’s charming restaurants.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Experience modern Mexico at Villa Amalfi. This sleek, stylish vacation rental is set in the new Aldea Zama neighborhood, a pedestrian-friendly area of Tulum that’s between the beach and the charming town center. High-tech amenities, chic interiors and five bedrooms are perfect for a sunny getaway with friends or a tropical holiday with extended family.With its quiet courtyard, private pool, shaded hammocks and al-fresco dining area, the villa feels like your own hideaway in the jungle. Stop by the markets in town for fresh seafood to try out on the barbecue and end the day with cocktails on the palapa-covered rooftop terrace. After dark, a satellite TV and Wi-Fi are ready to entertain.The indoor and outdoor living areas at Villa Amalfi feel like one large space, thanks to a nearly wall-to-wall glass sliding door that connects the great room to the courtyard. Colorful and comfortable, the living room and fully equipped kitchen feature a mix of furnishings, lively turquoise hues and even traditional tilework for an ambience of laid-back luxury.There are three bedrooms in the main house: two with a king bed and en-suite bathroom, one with a queen bed and en-suite, and one with two twin beds and a shared half-bathroom. A separate living area with a king bed, en-suite bathroom and mini-fridge could be used as a honeymoon-style retreat within the property.More than just a beach destination, the Riviera Maya has plenty to see and do. And Villa Amalfi is at the heart of it all, only a short drive from the Tulum beach and the must-see Tulum ruins. Take a day trip to enjoy the natural scenery of Cenote Chaak Tun or to sample the vibrant atmosphere and famed nightlife in Playa del Carmen.Please note that this region may be affected by shifting seasonal currents and weather patterns causing an influx of seaweed at the beach.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: The traditional charm of beamed ceilings and stone walls fits seamlessly with state-of-the-art details at this modern recreation of an Italian farmhouse. While it’s surrounded by the cypress trees and vineyards of the quintessential Tuscan landscape, it also has an open-concept layout not found in historic homes. Pick up produce in the hill town of Casole d’Elsa and day-trip to Siena and Florence.Spot field, forest, and distant hills from outdoor living areas with a swimming pool, sitting areas, a row of loungers in the sunshine, and alfresco dining under a pergola. Serve dinner from the barbecue and pizza oven, or step inside to watch a show on the smart TV and share holiday updates via Wi-Fi.Stone arches, wood-beamed ceilings and a large hearth hearken back to the past in the living room of this vacation rental, where 3 sitting areas make it easy to catch up with friends and family. By contrast, a wall of windows lines one side of the open-concept dining area and fully equipped kitchen, which is laid out around a gleaming blue and brass range.This luxury property has 3 bedrooms with king beds, including one that opens to a terrace, and 1 bedroom with 2 queen beds. All 4 bedrooms have private ensuite bathrooms, air conditioning and, like the main living areas, plenty of traditional style, whether in the form of a four-poster bed, wood floors, or windows with painted shutters.With concierge service included in your stay, it’s easy to make the most of your time in Italy. Book a cooking or wine-tasting class, take a bicycle or horseback ride through the landscape, reserve a tee time at a nearby golf course, or take a honeymoon from the everyday at a spa. If you’re keen to explore, plan day trips to the cities of Siena and Florence.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Casa Tepui is an enchanting private home at Tulum, situated within a gated community just one kilometer from Aldea Zama. With the ambiance of a jungle sanctuary, the villa blends contemporary architectural principles, high-end comforts, and the timeless, naturalistic minimalism of the Maya Riviera. Superb features include a private swimming pool, rooftop hot tub, gourmet kitchen, and four beautiful bedrooms with king or queen beds. The community also features a shared pool, clubhouse, paddle-tennis court, and 24-hour security, while various in-villa services are available.The villa's unique design by Tulum based Co-Lab Design delivers a graceful, seamless fusion of interior and outdoor living, with ample terraces and airy rooms that seem to hover amid the lush foliage. Savor a refreshing dip in the swimming pool and relax in hammocks strung within the wooden veranda. Kindle the barbecue grill in the afternoon, and relish a wonderful meal of local fruits, vegetables, and seafood. Sip juice or cocktails in the evening light, and crawl into the hot tub for a moonlit soak.Pocket doors open from the pool to the living room and kitchen, infusing the interior with an alfresco ambiance. The open-concept space includes a beautiful dining table, comfortable lounge, and fully equipped kitchen with generous prep areas and chef-quality appliances. Luminous white surfaces complement natural wood accents, harmonizing with the lush green surroundings. Air conditioning keeps you cool when necessary.There are two suites with king beds and ensuite bathrooms; one suite with a queen bed and ensuite bathroom; and a fourth room with a queen bed. All of the rooms include air conditioning, ceiling fans, and safes, and all enjoy dreamy jungle views. The arrangements are perfect for a family reunions, corporate retreat, or destination wedding guests.Casa Tepui is within walking distance of the shops and restaurants at Aldea Zama, and just over three kilometers from the main nightlife district of Tulum. Paradise Beach and the area's famous Mayan ruins are just over five kilometers away.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: This superb apartment is situated in the heart of Mayfair, in the West End of London, within walking distance or a short cab ride of Piccadilly Circus, Hyde Park, and the designer boutiques along Bond Street. The building was recently refurbished (ending in February 2018), which is reflected in the fresh, modern elegance of this private abode. Three bedrooms accommodate six guests in all, providing an ideal haven for families or groups of friends seeking stylish serenity and a prime location within this global capital of style and culture.The apartment features a beautiful salon area for savoring time with loved-ones. Comfortable sofas and armchairs face the flat-screen 4K TV with satellite channels, illuminated by ceiling lights, exquisite lamps, and a triptych of windows. The open kitchen is fully equipped and serves a breakfast bar with plush-covered chairs, as well as a gorgeous dining room with vaulted, skylight ceilings over a table for six. The décor is understated yet exquisite, with lovely touches of naturalistic artwork, lush potted plants, and chevron-patterned parquet floors extending throughout the home. Heating, air conditioning, and underfloor heating in the bathrooms keep you comfortable in all seasons.The master suite features a king bed accompanied by a TV, an exterior window, and a charming portal into the dining room, while its ensuite bathroom features a shower, tub, and dual vanity. Each of the two guest suites includes a double bed and ensuite bathroom, and one enjoys a pair of lovely French windows. Pendant lamps and beautiful pieces of original artwork frame each bed.The apartment's coveted location places you within minutes of countless destinations in central London. Enjoy a shopping excursion on Bond Street; meander through Hyde Park; admire the masterpieces of the National Gallery; and take in a play in the Theater District.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: This beautiful Hawaiian villa is situated on the south shore of Maui near Kalepolepo Beach Park. Bordering undeveloped state conversation land, the villa enjoys unobstructed, 180-degree views of Maalaea Bay and the vast Pacific. A contemporary architectural gem, it includes 5,700 square feet of interior space, a 1,300-square foot lanai, and an expansive pool terrace nestled amid lush palms and gardens. The property has five spacious bedroom suites.The terrace features a saltwater swimming pool with elevated spa, from which guests can gaze upon a sublime panorama of Haleakala volcano and the famous Maui sunset. Comfortable loungers and charming pendant sunbeds invite you to bask in the open air after a refreshing plunge.A 21-foot-wide, folding glass wall fuses the terrace and interior, where a sumptuous lounge is arranged for TV watching or horizon gazing, and a dining table welcomes ocean-view feasts. A gourmet kitchen surveys the space, with leathered quartize marble countertops, chef-grade stainless steel appliances, a wet bar, and a wine fridge. At once rustic and progressively contemporary, the interior décor features Belgian limestone tile and custom French oak floors, while top-of-the-line smart-home technology includes Lutron black-out shades, a Heos Home Audio System, and video surveillance, all easily controlled with a personal device.A floating staircase leads to the master suite and three guest suites upstairs. All of these main-house bedrooms enjoy gorgeous vistas of the ocean and volcano, and three of them open to the balcony. The master and primary guest suites have king beds, while the other two have queens. All of the bedrooms are air conditioned and enjoy ensuite bathrooms.While offering extraordinary serenity and seclusion, the villa is conveniently located near the shops and nightlife at Kihei and Wailea, while a Safeway grocery is close by for stocking up on food for the group. Kalepolepo Beach Park is just a minute's drive away, while several other renowned beaches are within three to ten miles. Just eleven miles from Kahului Airport, the villa is a convenient choice for hassle-free getaways or destination wedding guests.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.Permit #BBKM 2018/0001HAWAII TAX ID #: GE-204-357-6320-01

listing.listing_description: Villa Yenmoz is located in an enclosed park sector of Bab Atlas Palmeraie, just five minutes outside of Marrakech. Although close to the city, once you enter Yenmoz lush, expertly manicured grounds, you’d never know it. Designed to promote tranquility, serenity, and relaxation, Villa Yenmoz is the perfect host for a retreat with friends or colleagues, as well as any other special event that requires outdoor space.Traditional and authentic Moroccan design is showcased on the Yenmoz estate. Inspired by the red-clay houses of Morocco’s ancient villagers, Yenmoz is a unique vacation spot for visitors who wish to immerse themselves in the local culture. Beautiful works of art add splashes of color to the warm and inviting living room. Decorated with designer furniture and high-end electronics, this villa manages to maintain modern elegance and luxury, while portraying Morocco’s natural, slightly rustic influence. The kitchen, however, is all modern and sure to inspire your inner chef with its state of the art appliances and functional layout.Inside, you’ll find the villa’s fully equipped kitchen, with state of the art appliances, and a breakfast table. The formal dining area and the alfresco set both have seating for eight. After dinner, spend the night on the terrace, enjoying the gardens, and maybe a late-night swim. If you’d prefer a night in, Yenmoz has a television, a wood burning fireplace, air conditioning, and Wi-Fi. And, the villa comes with a butler, daily cleaning service, security, and airport transfer.When it’s time to venture beyond the walls of Yenmoz, you won’t have far to travel before you’re engulfed by the vibrant downtown core of Marrakech. Start with the square of Djemaa El-Fna if you want to jump right into the excitement, you’ll find musicians, dancers, snake charmers, and hundreds of stalls serving up unique local delicacies and souvenirs. Right next to the square is The Souks, Marrakech’s main marketplace, where you can buy almost anything.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Ski-in, ski-out access, a location close to Park City’s historic downtown and cozy modern interiors will have you applauding Mountain Symphony. One of the few homes with slopeside access to Park City Mountain Resort, this luxury Utah vacation rental makes it easy to enjoy a ski holiday with up to nine family or friends.At the end of a day on the slopes, glide up to the house, leave your gear in the ski storage area and indulge in a soak in the private hot tub on the terrace, curl up by the gas fireplace, put a movie on the large projector screen or challenge other guests on the video game systems. In warmer months, enjoy the mountain views from the terrace while you wait for the barbecue to heat up, then serve drinks around the firepit while you watch the stars come out.The great room of Mountain Symphony brings together country influences and modern style in harmony, with a vaulted ceiling, exposed beams, hardwood floors and large windows. In the sitting area, a soft sectional, cognac-hued leather chairs and a stone fireplace are a cozy grouping, with a vintage pair of skis adding a rustic note. The formal dining area in the center of the room seats six in appetite-whetting red chairs, and there’s more seating at the breakfast bar in the adjacent fully equipped kitchen.Mountain Symphony has one bedroom with a king bed and en-suite bathroom, and two bedrooms that share a bathroom with a queen bed and bunk bed, respectively. Larger parties can also use the twin bed and trundle bed in the den, which has an adjoining bathroom, for extra accommodations.From the villa’s location on the playfully named Quit’N Time run at the Park City Mountain Resort, it’s just seconds to the nearest ski slope, a 5-minute walk to the Town Lift chairlift and a 5-minute drive to Deer Valley Resort. Make the 2-minute walk to Park City’s Main Street for an evening of shopping or a romantic, honeymoon-worthy dinner out, or the 5-minute walk to the town’s Sunday market. Take a break from skiing with an afternoon of skating at the local ice arena, marvel over a visit to Utah Olympic Park and, in warm weather, play a round or two at Park City Golf Club. When it’s time to leave, plan on a 38-mile drive from Mountain Symphony to the airport in Salt Lake City.

listing.listing_description: Villa dell'Angelo is a restored 18th-century Tuscan villa on the western slope of Mount Albano, with an expansive saline pool and antique-filled interior that make it the ideal accommodation for a family or group of up to eight people.Cradled among spectacular views of the mountains, Villa Angelo is an exceptional 4-bedroom stone villa that embodies genuine Tuscan flavor. Villa dell'Angelo presents a picturesque location for a family gathering or special occasion, and is outfitted with the modern comforts you require for a relaxing holiday.This villa is centered on 18 acres of woods and olive groves. The living areas have been decorated with antique furniture (some pieces dating back as far as the 16th century), paintings, doors, prints and Persian carpets for an authentic atmosphere. Sink into plush damask sofas in the living room, which is dominated by a large carved stone decorative fireplace, and topped by a coffered ceiling. The large antique dining table is the ideal place to gather for a special Italian meal with family or friends. Cozy up to the kitchen’s fireplace and savor a true-to-life, historic Italian kitchen that is nonetheless fully equipped.After a wonderful meal, drift off to sleep under the soaring ceilings of the bedrooms. The bathrooms are updated with modern conveniences, such as rainhead showers and jetted tubs. Outdoors, the lawn is kept manicured and several outdoor seating areas create inviting spaces to enjoy a glass of wine among the olive and cypress trees. The saline pool features a large hydromassage area, terrace and changing area.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Perched up high on the seaside hills of Corossol, this St. Barts luxury villa is perfect for a romantic getaway, or honeymoon. With panoramic ocean views, Passage's balcony is an incredible vantage point for Caribbean sunsets. Just five minutes from shopping, restaurants, and nightlife in Gustavia, you'll have a prime location for exploring this iconic vacation destination. And, there are seven beautiful beachfront areas within two-to-ten kilometers of Passage.When your property is given a gift, like Passage's incredible ocean view, you design accordingly. Every room in this hillside villa faces, and opens to the ocean. Floor-to-ceiling glass doors dominate the exterior wall. When open, the entire living room and master bedroom have free-flowing access to the pool and balcony. Fresh ocean breeze and natural sunlight easily fill the modern-minimalistic interior. Decorated with designer furniture, high-end electronics, and splashes of turquoise, Passage has a calming, yet elegant atmosphere. The kitchen features a wall of stylish cabinetry and fully integrated appliances. Between the lounge and the kitchen, the gorgeous modern wood dining table, with seating for eight, divides the space. And, on the other side of the villa, the master bedroom awaits, with a king-sized bed, en-suite, walk-in closet, and ocean view.Some of the other interior features include Wi-Fi, air conditioning, a dishwasher, and several television options. On the balcony, there's alfresco dining, lounge chairs, living areas, and a barbecue, all surrounding the refreshing infinity pool.Undoubtedly, Passage's ocean view will inspire you to get out and see it first hand. Luckily, you're in St. Barts, one of the world's finest beach vacation destinations. Within nine kilometers you'll be able to find eight amazing beachfront areas, the closest being St Jean Beach. Nikki, Gouverneur, and Flamands Beach are the most popular on the Island. Colombier is a great alternative, as it is accessible only by boat, or a twenty-minute hike beginning at the Port of Gustavia.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Cloud Cabin is a beautiful contemporary villa in Breckenridge. Located at the top of White Cloud Drive less than two miles from BreckExpress Lift, the four-bedroom villa features exquisite mountain-modern design, luxurious indoor and outdoor spaces for relaxation and entertainment, and expansive views of Ten Mile Range and the Breckenridge slopes.The villa's design gives a contemporary interpretation of classic mountain-lodge charm. The interior's main floor features a capacious Great Room illuminated by two-story mountain-view windows. In the sumptuous lounge, the sectional and armchairs of supple leather face the central hearth with fireplace and mounted flat screen TV, perfect for relaxing with family and friends. The kitchen is fully equipped with chef-grade Thermador appliances and an island breakfast bar, while the elegant dining table for eight is ideal for epic feasts. Woven bamboo flooring, exposed wooden beams, and lovely furnishings create an exquisite alpine ambience. Downstairs, the villa's ground floor includes a dozy media room with smart TV.Outside the Great Room, the wrap-around deck features a barbeque grill and outdoor furniture for alfresco dining and relaxation in the mountain air. On the downstairs patio, a hot tub invites you to a delicious soak beneath the towering pines.The villa's four deluxe bedrooms sleep ten. The spacious master suite features a king size bed, fireplace, and ensuite bathroom with stand-alone shower and bath. The first guest room has a queen bed and ensuite bathroom, and opens directly to the patio with hot tub. The other two guestrooms share a hallway bathroom; ne has a queen size bed, while the other has two twins—perfect for kids.Cloud Cabin's location gives you a wonderful balance of secluded privacy and easy access to Breckenridge. The villa is right in Warrior's Mark near Peak 9 and 10, with excellent cross-country skiing and snowshoeing options and access to the Burro Trail for advanced skiers. BreckConnect Gondola is about two miles away, while a little farther on is the Gondola to Peak 8. Copper Mountain is twenty miles away. Kids will love sledding and tubing at Carter Park, while Golfers are in easy reach of Breckenridge Golf Club, six miles away. For evenings on the town, Main Street in Breckenridge is just minutes from your door.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Sitting just a block away from Main Street, this contemporary villa in Park City is a cozy retreat for ski getaways and is one of our top Utah vacation rentals. Park City is considered one of North America’s top alpine ski resorts and is a frequent host of international ski competitions.After a day on the slopes, head back for a soak under the stars in the outdoor hot tub. Once you’ve dried off, relax with a movie in the theater room; it features a comfy L-shaped sofa and a large projector screen. This villa also boasts a heated one-car garage, included WiFi and during winter season there’s a daily complimentary towel and amenity service.This newly constructed, 2,350-square-foot home exudes an inviting, open-concept space. The living room is done in soft grey and white tones with silver accent pieces and stylish furnishings surrounding a gas fireplace. Meanwhile, natural light pours in through multiple windows, the skylight and glass doors that open up to a balcony. Nearby, the kitchen is equally bright and comes fully equipped with modern appliances and a center island with a breakfast bar.There are three individually decorated bedrooms in this home. The master suite has a king size bed as well as a sitting area next to a fireplace with a flatscreen television and access to a patio. A second room includes two twin beds, while a third offers a double size bed.You’ll be conveniently close to the town ski lift at Park City Mountain Resort—just a five minute walk. This home is also located close to Main Street where you’ll find diverse shopping, dining and nightlife options.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Experience contemporary luxury in the setting of a charming, traditional beach town at Villa Alegria. Set on a cliff over the village of Salema, this breathtaking vacation rental boasts views over one of the prettiest landscapes in the Algarve and a location just steps from the beach. Share a sun-splashed holiday with up to eight friends and family at this four-bedroom haven—or a honeymoon-style escape with your beloved.Terraced gardens set into the hillside offer sea views at every level. At the rooftop, you’ll find an expansive outdoor living area with a pool, lounging and dining areas, and a barbecue. Inside the villa, high-tech amenities range from a satellite TV and DVD player to Wi-Fi.Nearly wall-to-wall windows on two sides bring the sea views into the open-plan living and dining room. Sleek furnishings add modern flair, while a color scheme of rich blues and crisp whites is a nod to the oceanfront location. The fully equipped kitchen is tucked behind the great room, but keeps the color scheme going with glossy white cabinetry and a cerulean backsplash.Each of the four bedrooms at Villa Alegria has a king bed and en-suite bathroom; one bedroom also has its own fireplace, and two of the bedrooms share a terrace. In each suite, you’ll find the same modern lines, cool tones and thoughtful details such as built-in storage.While the villa is a private seaside retreat, it’s only a 1-minute walk from the Salema beach, a stretch of golden sand frequented by visitors and locals alike. Pause to watch the fishermen unload the day’s catch, or while away an afternoon at restaurant on the water. For golf, tennis and a spa, drive to Santo Antonio Resort; for more shopping and dining options, drive into Lagos.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Take in the wooded coastline and blue expanse of the Gulf of Thailand from this hilltop Koh Samui mansion. Bathed in sunshine, the stylish interiors and clean, lengthy terrace that ensures guests can soak up lots of island sunshine. Touches like the comfortable wrap-around couches, pool table and epic-sized kitchen will delight guests, with beaches, zipline waterfalls and welcoming towns nearby. Begin the day on the shaded terrace of Villa Marella, sipping on fresh juice as the sun plays with shades of blue and white in the depths of the inviting pool. From its raised location, the home receives a pleasant maritime breeze, which plays amongst the branches of the young trees that punctuate the terrace. Inside, colorful, rainbow designs help the interior pop with style, hanging alongside premium furniture as air-conditioning ensures that guests can bask in the ideal temperature. The billiards table, immersive home cinema and full entertainment system ensures that guests can choose the recreation that best suits their particular tastes.Located in the popular north of the island, Villa Marella offers rapid access to some of the most storied beaches on the island, including the white sand expanse of Thongson Bay. Numerous striking examples of the island’s rich Buddhist culture abound, including towering temples and seaside statues that are open to visitors. For those feeling more adventurous, take to the waves for a day cruise or water scooter outing from the nearby sea sports locations, with thrilling zip-lining over cascading waterfalls also close by.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Near the Caribbean’s gourmet paradise - Grand Case - sits the exclusive, very private enclave of Mont Choisy, home to the stylish Happy Bay Villa. The home’s elegant entrance, with lush tropical gardens and stunning native boulders, creates an inviting stage for this classic French Creole home dressed in soft yellows and trimmed with elegant dark wood details.Entering the villa, the stunning panoramic views dazzle with a brilliant sweep of tropical green mountains and endless blue sea and sky. Anguilla is on the horizon. Just below the deck you see waves crashing on the beach. Surrounding the villa are colorful gardens filled with tropical flowers as well as papaya and banana trees. The blue endless heated pool connects the amazing view to the villa. The spacious horseshoe shaped epi wood terrace is filled with outdoor dining and seating to enjoy the view and wonderful breezes. Little seating niches and a large covered gazebo offer quiet places to relax.The interior great room, with spaces for seating and dining, is fully air condition or opens fully to the tropical breeze. Floor to ceiling glass doors bring in the view. Travertine floors run throughout the interiors. The recently renovated décor has an open and airy attitude in a mix of contemporary and exotic furnishings and accessories in teak woods and soft taupe and cream colors. The modern fully equipped kitchen, open to the view, is tastefully designed in glass tiles, stainless appliances and grey with pops of color.The four bedrooms, with en-suite bathrooms, are off the main salon and under one roof. Each has interior and exterior doors for access to the pool, a small office/work space and fabulous sea views. Three bedrooms are accessible off a large media room with flat screen TV, perfect for teenagers are kids to share this wing of the villa. The master bedroom, located on the opposite side of the villa, is its own private oasis. Private for some but still connected given all bedrooms are under the same roof and all accessible from the inside. Each bathroom is uniquely designed in interesting mixes of materials and stylish fixtures plus they are fully air conditioned.

listing.listing_description: Breathtaking natural scenery outside and local materials and artwork inside create a true sense of place at Villa Watina. Just steps from the golden sands of Ambergris Caye Beach and a short drive from the town of San Pedro, this oceanfront Belize vacation rental has a setting that’s both postcard perfect and convenient. Hand-crafted furniture and decor and three suite-style bedrooms create an ambience of thoughtful luxury for family getaways or beach holidays with friends.An array of shared pools and hot tubs is the only thing between Villa Watina and the Caribbean Sea. Swim a few laps there, stretch out in a lounge chair on the pool terrace or step down to the beach and borrow a sea kayak or stand-up paddleboard to take out on the water. If you’d rather explore on land, pedal one of the bicycles through the seaside landscape. In the evenings, the surround sound system, movie collection and Wi-Fi are sure to entertain.Stone floors, stately columns and beamed ceilings give the villa the elegance of a Tuscan country estate, but the furniture and artwork bring in Central American style. Wicker sofas, stools and side tables have relaxed natural texture, throw pillows add lively pattern and color and plenty of polished wood is a nod to the rainforests of Belize. Sit down to a memorable dinner at the formal dining area, or a more casual meal at the breakfast bar in the fully equipped kitchen.Three bedrooms with en-suite bathrooms are inviting private retreats at the end of a day in the sun by the pool or exploring the area. The master bedroom is as well appointed as a honeymoon suite, with a king bed, jetted tub, ocean views and a balcony. The other two bedrooms each have queen beds; one opens to a balcony as well.Plan to fly into San Pedro Airport, 3.5 miles from Villa Watina, or Philip S.W. Goldson International Airport, 48 miles away. From the villa’s location on Ambergris Caye Beach, you can book a tour or diving expedition through Tuff E Nuff Tours, just over a half-mile away, get out on the tennis or basketball courts 1 mile away, or find shopping and dining in the town of San Pedro, 3 miles away. If you can’t get enough of the sand and warm water, it’s worth making a trip to X’Tan Ha Beach, 4.5 miles away, or Hol Chan Marine Reserve, 7 miles away._ Please note that this region may be affected by shifting seasonal currents and weather patterns causing an influx of seaweed at the beach. _Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.Read more about this villa in our magazine (http://magazine.luxuryretreats.com/the-secrets-out-on-ambergris-caye/)

listing.listing_description: This exquisite mountain villa is located on Camas Loop within the prestigious Elkhorn Community near Sun Valley Resort, with access to the community’s swimming pools, tennis club, and spa facilities. The home features ample, wrap-around terraces with alfresco dining and sublime sunset and sunrise views, including a breathtaking prospect of Bald Mountain, while its superbly appointed interiors include high-end media features, three fireplaces, and a gourmet kitchen. A deluxe master suite and two ample guest suites accommodate families and groups of friends up to six in size.The modern home blends vintage Rocky Mountain charm with superb contemporary comforts and gallery-worthy artwork. The large living room features high, vaulted ceilings of exposed natural wood, a beautiful stone hearth with wood-burning fireplace, and expansive windows that flood the home with alpine light. There is an interior dining table for eight as well as alfresco dining on the expansive deck. The open kitchen will inspire the gourmets among your party, with chef-grade appliances, generous prep space, a wine fridge, and a breakfast bar. Heating and air conditioning keep you comfortable in all seasons, and there is a home office for work or study.The bedrooms offer lovely private havens for cozy downtime and rest. The master suite includes a king bed, walk-in closet, fireplace, and ensuite bathroom with shower and jetted tub. The two guestrooms share a bathroom between them: one includes a king bed and walk-in closet, while the other has a queen bed.The Elkhorn Community offers an ideal location for enjoying the unique riches of Sun Valley. Play golf at Elkhorn Golf Club, enjoy the community's pools and tennis courts in the summer, and soothe your muscles in the sauna and steam room. Beyond Elkhorn, you’re just six minutes from Dollar Mountain, eight minutes from Bald Mountain, and four miles from River Run at Sun Valley Resort—easily accessible by car or the free shuttle service. Downtown Ketchum is about four miles away, where you'll find superb dining, Magic Lantern Cinemas, and much more.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: European charm is in the details at this slopeside retreat at The Ritz-Carlton Club nestled in the shadow of Vail Mountain. You’ll see it in the village views, the turned-wood accents, and an exterior as bright yellow as a German palace—and feel it in the five-star service at the Ritz. It’s a 1-minute walk to the ski slopes and an even quicker ride on the complimentary shuttle.After the day’s last run, follow the steam to the heated outdoor pool and hot tub at the Ritz, which villa guests are welcome to use. If it’s still sunny out, have the first après-ski drink on the furnished private terrace; if not, cozy up to the indoor fireplace instead.Though the villa is laid out around a simple open-concept great room, luxe details elevate the space. Sink into the leather sofa or one of the armchairs in front of the fireplace, recount the day’s best runs at the welcoming round dining table for 6, or have an after-dinner coffee at the breakfast bar in the fully equipped kitchen.If you’re chasing powder, board the complimentary shuttle to the slopes or make the 5-minute drive yourself to Eagle Bahn Gondola 19 at Vail Ski Resort. Beaver Creek Resort is also just 12 miles away if you’re looking for variety. For shops, restaurants, or a night out, it’s a 4-minute drive into Lionshead Village and a 2-minute drive into Vail Village.Business License: STL001956Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Villa Melissa is a stunning oceanfront villa in the Cangggu area of Bali, along the southern shore of the island. One of five villas located within Pantai Lima Estates, the villa features expansive views of the Indian Ocean from its ample pool terrace, interior living areas, and three of its five bedrooms. The extraordinary structure and design blends vintage Balinese style with contemporary amenities and comforts, enhanced by a professional staff that includes a chef, property manager, driver, housekeeping, and security. Guests enjoy access to the estate's tennis court and fitness facility, while several famed beaches are within minutes.Perched along the shore between beautiful stone walls, the villa's terrace features an ample, T-shaped swimming pool extending from the house, lined with sun loungers and tall palms. Along the shore, twin gazebos flank a lush lawn, one with alfresco dining, one with elegant sunbeds oriented toward the sublime horizon.Beautiful stairs ascend from the pool to the majestic home, where the terrace transitions seamlessly into an interior salon with lounge areas and soaring ceilings. An adjacent dining room features multiple tables, a bar, and glass doors opening to the ocean breeze. Gorgeous wood floors, furnishings, and trim, along with exceptional works of art, evoke the timeless culture and natural beauty of Indonesia.All five bedroom suites include ensuite bathrooms, and three enjoy enchanting ocean views. There are three king suites, all with stand-alone showers and tubs in their bathrooms. The other two suites—one with queen bed, one with two twins—feature alfresco showers. All of the rooms have air conditioning, ceiling fans, TVs, and safes. The understated naturalism of their décor inspires profound rest in harmony with the rhythmic waves.Guests enjoy access to the Pantai Lima Estate amenities, while Echo Beach and Canggu Beach are both within minutes by car. Golfers are less than ten kilometers from Nirwana Bali Golf. Less than twenty kilometers from Ngurah Rai International Airport less, Villa Melissa is an excellent choice for destination wedding guests or hassle-free family reunions.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Secluded amid aspen and pine woods near Teton Village, Holly Haus is located just three minutes from Jackson Hole Mountain Resort and about a mile from Shooting Star Golf Club. The modern, chalet-style home offers ample space and resort-like features including an alfresco hot tub and cavernous great room, while its four gorgeous bedrooms include a spacious master suite and a kid-friendly bunk room, accommodating ten guests in all.The villa's main living areas are located on the upper level. Cathedral windows gaze out from the vaulted great room into the rich forest, while a gorgeous stone hearth with wood-burning fireplace warms the open-concept space. The luminous kitchen features chef-grade appliances and an island bar, and easily serves the dining table and lounge. Glass doors open to the upper-level deck, where a dining table welcomes alfresco feasts on warm summer evenings. The stand-alone spa is located on the patio below, beckoning you to a starlit soak in the crisp, pine-scented air.Sharing the upper level with the great room, the master suite enjoys high, vaulted ceilings, ample windows, and doors to the deck, while its spacious ensuite bathroom includes dual vanities, a steam shower, and a jetted soaking tub with lovely forest views. On the ground floor, the primary guest suite features a king bed and ensuite bathroom, while the other two rooms—one with queen bed, one with two bunk beds (sleeping four)—share a bathroom between them, forming an ideal family suite. These lower-level rooms open to the patio and hot tub.Holly Haus offers an extraordinary balance of seclusion and convenience, with a prime location just four minutes from the heart of Teton Village and three minutes from Jackson Hole Mountain Resort. Outstanding hiking trails can be accessed from the property, while the fairways of Shooting Star are just over a mile away.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Situated amongst the Aldea Zama neighbourhood’s luscious jungle greenery, Villa Verde is just minutes from town, the Tulum Ruins, and breathtaking cenotes. This four bedroom luxury rental is located close to the action, while maintaining unsurpassed privacy. Perfect for a family vacation or a Mexican getaway with friends, this area of the Mayan Riviera is rich with beautiful landscapes, exciting nightlife, and astonishing historical sights.Designed to embrace its tropical surroundings, Villa Verde delightfully blurs the line between inside and out. The open concept living/dining/kitchen space features a floor-to-ceiling opening, stretching its entire length. Exposed wood beams and intricate stone work set a charming rustic tone, mixed with modern furniture, lighting fixtures, and high-end appliances, Verde is tropical elegance at its finest.Outside on the terrace, guests will love the private atmosphere created by the natural surroundings. The swimming pool is a great place to cool off in the afternoon. After your swim, head up to the rooftop patio to work on your tan from one of the hammocks. At meal time, there’s space for eight in the formal dining area and lots of seating outside, should you choose to dine alfresco.All four of Villa Verde’s bedrooms feature king sized beds and en-suite bathrooms. The ground floor bedroom has direct access to the pool and an alfresco bath tub. There are three bedrooms on the first floor, one of which has a separate entrance, kitchenette, and private balcony.When it’s time to get out and do some exploring, the Tulum ruins are a great place to start. After that, check out El Gran Cenote, Tulum’s most popular section of cavernous underground waterways. With ample wood decking and multiple entrance points, it’s the perfect introduction to this natural phenomenon. And, no Mexican vacation is complete without a trip to the beach. Just ten minutes away, the beautifully sandy shores of Tulum beach await.Please note that this region may be affected by shifting seasonal currents and weather patterns causing an influx of seaweed at the beach.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Standing gracefully on 3,000 square meters of gorgeous orchards and landscaped garden near Kolymvari and Chania, the three-bedroom Villa Ianira is a luxury sanctuary with stunning views of the Sea of Crete and White Mountains, offering exquisite privacy and ample space for indoor and outdoor entertainment.The villa's unique design combines ancient elegance, contemporary lines, and cutting-edge principles of environmental harmony. The outdoor terrace features two swimming pools and wide views of the sea and islands. Beside it, under the villa's eaves, the large outdoor lounge is ideal for spending long days and evenings relishing the ocean breeze. The covered alfresco dining table for eight, beside the rustic wood-burning oven and barbeque, is where you'll savor nighttime dinners and lunches in the cool shade. Beyond the terrace, amid the gardens and groves, you'll find lush lawns for sunbathing and a charming playground for children.Indoors, under high, vaulted ceilings, the open-plan living area features a comfortable lounge surrounding a wood-burning fire place and satellite television. With the dining table beside it, ample floor space, and a sound system, the living area welcomes long dinner parties with fine Greek wine and cuisine. Through an antique archway, you'll find the fully equipped kitchen with breakfast bar and splendid exposed masonry. The villa's beautiful wood floors and dreamy lighting create the ideal ambience for enjoying time together with family and friends.The soft tones and natural light of the tastefully minimalist bedrooms will keep you cool during the day and cozy at night. The master bedroom features a king size bed and ocean views from its windows and private balcony, as well as ensuite bathroom with stand-alone bathtub. The second bedroom has two single beds, while the third has a king. Each has an ensuite bathroom with stand-alone shower, and they share a covered terrace.Beyond the self-contained paradise of Villa Ianira, you're just moments away from the beaches and charm of the western Cretan coast. Hop in your car and drive two minutes to Kolymarvi Beach and Kolymarvi Village, or twenty minutes to Chania, with its restaurants, bars, museums, and breathtaking architecture combining Greek, Roman, and Venetian influences.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Etoile de Mer sits at the edge of the sea in the private village of Shore Point right on the French/Dutch Border. Like an exquisite microcosm of a gleaming white Greek island, the villas of Shore Point are individual, elegant gems within a luxurious gated community. The entrance to Etoile de Mer is framed by lush tropical bushes and classic white columns. An elegant frosted glass door opens to the dramatic descending marble staircase that transports you to the main living area and a stunning view of the blue sky, Caribbean Sea and the outer islands.The contemporary interiors, with tumbled travertine floors, flow through stunning glass and wood sliding doors right onto a spacious covered terrace and deck. The wraparound space is perfect for outdoor dining and lounging. Graceful arches and columns draw your eye to the deep blue pool that seems to flow straight to the sea.The interior décor blends tropical tones and patterns with teak woods accents; elegant and comfortable. Colorful local art adorns the walls throughout the villa. The open plan living area features a high-end kitchen with luxury appliances, beautiful woods and stainless steel. The indoor dining area is between the kitchen and the view. The large main living area combines lounging and media spaces with a powder room is conveniently located on the first floor.The four equal size bedrooms have king size beds, sea views, private outdoor seating areas and beautiful en suite bathrooms. Each room features a romantic iron canopy bed and soft white color scheme accented with tropical prints. Each of the spa style bathroom with walk in showers; the décor combines woods, glass, tiles and river stones with sleek brushed chrome fixtures. One bathroom has a large soaking tub.Although private, you are very close to amenities. 3 minutes to Puerto Cupecoy with a terrific little gourmet market, wonderful restaurants and stunning views. In 5 minutes you reach the airport, 10 minutes to the charming French capital of Marigot and about 30 minutes to either Grand Case or Phillipsburg._ Please Note: The size and nature of Cupecoy Beach may be affected by shifting seasonal currents and weather patterns. Renters are encouraged to explore Mullet Bay Beach as an alternative only a 2 minute drive from the villa. _

listing.listing_description: Find your bliss at the breathtaking oceanfront Villa Nandana. Named for the Sanskrit word meaning “paradise,” this four-bedroom luxury Phang Nga vacation rental has panoramic views over the turquoise waters of the Andaman sea and is just a few barefoot steps from the white sands of Natai Beach. Bring the family for a relaxed tropical getaway, use the villa as the setting for an unforgettable destination wedding or make it the backdrop of an ultra-private honeymoon in Thailand.A chef, a housekeeper and a property manager guarantee your comfort during your stay—and provide daily breakfast. The resort-worthy perks continue with a sprawling terrace with shaded sitting areas and a row of chaise lounges in the sun, an infinity pool, a palm-dotted lawn stretching toward the sea and a private fitness room and spa area. Enjoy the ocean’s bounty hot off the barbecue at the alfresco dining pavilion and share photos of the day via Wi-Fi before retiring to air-conditioned rooms.Natural finishes and an open-plan (and open-air) layout give Villa Nandana a serene feel that’s in tune with the incredible setting. In the great room, which has glass walls that can be pushed back to let in the ocean breeze, soaring wood-paneled ceilings and a free-form coffee table add drama, while sleek white sofas strewn with cushions are soft and inviting. Mid-century inspired chairs are an unexpected touch in the dining area, but their clean modern lines fit right into the sophisticated space. There’s more richly hued wood paneling to be found in the fully equipped kitchen, along with stainless steel appliances and a generous breakfast bar.Each of the four bedrooms at Villa Nandana has a king bed, ensuite bathroom and ocean views, and opens directly to the terrace, ensuring that there’s no choice of garden view or pool view on this beach holiday. Vaulted and paneled ceilings make each bedroom feel like its own pavilion, and mod lounge chairs give you an extra private space to relax.Thanks to the villa’s location on Natai Beach, only a few steps lie between you and the sun-kissed sand. Take the car to explore Ao Phang Nga National Park, 40 km away, play a round at Red Mountain Golf Course, 60 km away, do some shopping or enjoy a meal in Old Town Phuket, just over 63 km away, or experience the vibrant nightlife on Bangla Road, about 76 km away. When your vacation is over, make your connection from Phuket International Airport, a 30 km drive from the villa.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Please note: This home is in close proximity to an ongoing construction project. For more information, please contact a Villa Specialist.Enjoy stylish city living amid ocean and mountain views at Artea. This Sea Point penthouse is a chic, contemporary space just minutes from the promenade, Clifton and Camps Bay beaches, and central Cape Town. Its open-plan design and three bedrooms make it ideal for a getaway with friends or a laid-back holiday with family.Take in views from the ocean to Lion’s Head and the city from the villa’s private rooftop deck, which features a pool, sitting and dining areas, and a barbecue. A second balcony has additional space for dining. After the sun sets on a day of sightseeing, unwind in front of the TV, put a favorite album on the sound system or share photos via Wi-Fi.Artea is laid out around an open-concept great room that’s flooded with light by floor-to-ceiling windows. There’s plenty of seating on the sleek sofa and lounge chairs or around the pedestal dining table, and the kitchen is fully equipped. A collection of original artwork complements the refined furnishings for an ambience of modern luxury.The penthouse has one master suite with a king bed and en-suite bathroom, and two bedrooms with queen beds that share a bathroom. Like the great room, the bedrooms have large windows, laminate floors and their own art pieces, making each one a stylish haven.With Camps Bay Beach within walking distance of this vacation rental, you’re just a few minutes away from a honeymoon-worthy stroll on the sand or dinner at an oceanfront restaurant. Make the short drive to Table Mountain and take the cable car to the top of this Cape Town icon, plan a hike or two around Lion’s Head and the Twelve Apostles, or drive into the city center and explore.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Idyllically positioned amidst the sparkling white sands and aquamarine waters of Rendezvous Bay in Anguilla, Arushi Villa brings private luxury to this spectacular and natural Caribbean paradise. As part of the five-star Cuisinart Resort, you will also have access to most of its marvelous facilities and services including the famous Gregg Norman golf course that’s just steps away.Arushi Villa’s pristine white exterior contrasts dramatically with Anguilla’s flawless cerulean blue skies. This modern and luxurious escape successfully combines thoughtfully designed indoor and outdoor living areas to provide you with perfect seclusion and relaxation. Your villa’s extensive amenities include an immaculate fully-equipped kitchen and dining area, a private heated pool and hot tub, al fresco dining facilities and the security and comfort that you are part of an exclusive gated community. For your convenience, all butler and concierge services are included in one simple rate.You’ll enjoy pampering and privacy with the five-star amenities of the exclusive Cuisinart Resort at your service, which include its fitness center and tennis courts. And for golf lovers, Anguilla’s famous 18-hole Gregg Norman golf course is right on your doorstep. There really is something special for everyone when you stay at Arushi.Arushi Villa’s five elegantly appointed master suites all include luxurious marble bathrooms and air conditioning throughout, ensuring you and your guests needs are all well looked after. All you need to do is relax and envelop yourself in Arushi’s restful ambience.At Arushi you can truly savor the experience of the perfect luxury tropical getaway that’s surrounded with lush natural beauty. You will also receive exceptional private service and access to the many amenities provided by the 5-star Cuisinart Resort and Spa. Safely and privately located within its gated community, it’s just a 9.1 km drive to The Valley, a 10.3 km drive to the hospital, just 3.4 km to the Blowing Point Ferry Terminal and a 8.9 km drive to Clayton J. Lloyd International Airport (AXA).Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: The Bird of Paradise Villa is a true gem for the connoisseur. Named one of the “Top 20 Villas in the World” by Islands Magazine, this Anguillan oasis offers the exclusivity of a boutique hotel, the privacy of an enclave and the top tier services and amenities of a first class resort. Perched above a perfect crescent beach, Bird of Paradise looks across the Caribbean to the mountains of St. Barths and St. Martin.Bird of Paradise boasts not one, but three swimming pool areas, the most extensive bathing system of any villa on Anguilla. The lagoon-style pools are heated and range in depth from three to nine feet. The property manager works exclusively for the villa and will meet and greet you upon arrival at the airport or dock. Your reservation includes a twenty-four hour concierge, daily housekeeping and a grounds person to assist with beach chairs and other requests. With its executive chef, Kids’ Club and spa services, you may never want to leave the grounds of this exclusive paradise.Bird of Paradise includes seating for more than fifty guests in the living areas. Other features across the approximately 4000 square feet property include an interior living room with a wet bar, an exterior living room with a fireplace, a covered verandah with a day bed and lounge chairs. Enjoy the privilege of your sundeck as well as a ‘hilltop’ deck with chairs and an Indonesian-style gazebo. Technology at Bird of Paradise includes flat screen televisions, DVDs, a nine-speaker sound system and Wi-Fi.The four air conditioned bedroom suites each have private, exterior entrances and private verandahs with lounge chairs and views of the beach. Each suite is equipped with a credenza that holds a refrigerator and coffee/wine service for added comfort. You will find interior/exterior showers, whirlpool baths and walk-in closets. Luxury linens, and toileteries, beach bags and towels are complimentary.Whether for walking, swimming and snorkeling, Sandy Hill Bay is a delightful beach for your time on this wonderful island. In nearby Sandy Ground, “the entertainment capital of Anguilla,” you will discover a sleepy village by day that lights up at night with imaginative beach bars and hot night spots. Come discover a soothing island rhythm and warm hospitality at Bird of Paradise!Read more about this villa in our magazine (http://magazine.luxuryretreats.com/girls-getaway-weekend-ideas/)Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Quartz Mountain is a fabulous Paradise Valley villa outside Scottsdale, situated just two minutes on foot from the famed Paradise Valley Country Club. The newly built, 7,000-square-foot home enjoys breathtaking views of Camelback Mountain, while its impressive amenities include a large outdoor swimming pool and hot tub, indoor and outdoor kitchens, and an excellent home office. With a superb master suite and six ample guestrooms with queen beds, Quartz Mountain is an ideal choice for families, corporate retreats, destination wedding guests, and golf vacations with friends.The villa's outdoor living areas inspire festive occasions or tranquil relaxation in the dreamy desert air. Savor a refreshing dip in the swimming pool and sunbathe on lounge chairs on the terrace. Fire up the grill for an afternoon barbeque, and dine alfresco in the mellowing light. Sip wine and cocktails by the fire pit at sunset, and relish a soak in the hot tub under the spectacular stars.The villa’s interiors are beautifully designed to create a graceful flow of space between rooms. The living room features a large, flat-screen TV, a fireplace, and comfortable seating under lovely wood ceiling beams. Gourmets will adore the capacious kitchen, featuring expansive prep space, top-of-the-line appliances, a long bar, an attached service kitchen, a wine and cocktail niche, a large pantry, and a casual dining table for eight. The elegant formal dining room features a table for ten under gorgeous chandeliers, a salon area with fireplace, and doors to a patio with fountain. The villa also features a fitness room and cozy media room, and there is air conditioning throughout.The lovely master suite includes a king bed, walk-in closet, and ensuite bathroom with stand-alone steam shower and deluxe vanity. Each of the six guestrooms features a queen bed and ensuite bathroom.In addition to being just steps from Paradise Valley Country Club, the villa is within five to ten minutes by car from several world-class resorts and sport clubs, including Camelback Golf Club, The Phoenician, and Camelback Village Racquet and Health Club. Scottsdale is only six miles away, and you're a short drive from Echo Canyon Recreation Area. Downtown Phoenix is about thirteen miles away.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Rolling hills, a fairy-tale stone house and rustic-chic interiors: you’ll find it all at Villa Federico. Tucked into the countryside outside Siena, this luxury vacation rental in Tuscany will quickly entrance you with its idyllic setting and beautiful indoor and outdoor living areas. It’s the perfect rural Italian escape for an unforgettable holiday with friends or family.Weekdays at Villa Federico begin with complimentary breakfast service, after which you can nestle into the study with a book or step outside to claim a lounge chair by the pool. As the sun sinks toward the hills, heat up the barbecue and linger into the evening over a bottle of local wine at the al-fresco dining area.The villa’s interiors combine the charm of the past with the comforts of the present. High ceilings, terracotta floors and plenty of French doors with landscape views set a traditional tone that’s matched by a roll-arm sofa and bergere chairs around an open-hearth fireplace in the living room, and a farmhouse-style table with slipcovered seating for six in the dining room. The incredible kitchen is fully equipped and even has a wood-burning stove and doors out to the patio.Villa Federico’s seven bedrooms are divided between the five-bedroom main house and two one-bedroom annexes. The main house has two bedrooms with queen beds, two with twin beds and one with a French bed; all have en-suite bathrooms and several have jetted tubs as well. Each annex has a queen bed (or two twin beds), en-suite bathroom and kitchenette, and one has its own jetted tub. With their separate, private entrances, the annexes could be used as honeymoon suites or in-law retreats.The best way to see Tuscany is to set off into the rolling hills on foot or on a bicycle. The property is just a short drive from the town of San Casciano dei Bagni, where you’ll find shops, local restaurants and cafes, and a legendary thermal spa that’s been soothing visitors for centuries. If you’d like to explore further, the towns of Cetona and Orvieto are close enough for a day trip.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

feature.strong: What to do in the San Casciano dei Bagni region of Tuscany?
feature.p: Take a visit to the renowned thermal spa in San Casciano dei Bagni. It was the Etruscans who first discovered the healing properties of the thermal waters in Val d'Orcia. In the 17th century, the renowned Medici family built a series of baths, which have been reborn as a luxurious new spa featured in Travel & Leisure.

The enchanting town of Cetona will charm you with its cobblestone streets and medieval architecture. This lovely village has grown in popularity as a home for international artists and socialites. Stop for an exquisite lunch or dinner at Osteria Vecchia (so good!)—you won't be disappointed.
Definitely worth a visit are Orvieto, Assisi and Todi. Head to Deruta to shop for the renowned local ceramics. Last but not least, make sure to check out the chocolate museum in Perugia!

listing.listing_address: San Casciano dei Bagni, Tuscany, Italy

listing.listing_description: Find plenty to celebrate at the beachfront Hacienda Magica. This expansive Riviera Maya vacation rental has a gorgeous location in the exclusive Puerto Aventuras community, an attentive staff and fourteen bedrooms. Reserve this luxury property to host a family reunion or milestone celebration, or along with nearby Hacienda Corazon and Hacienda Del Mar to hold a wedding for up to 250 guests—and the honeymoon afterDuring your holiday, a gourmet chef, manager, butler and housekeeper will see to your needs. The villa feels like your own resort on Fatima Bay, with a pool, outdoor lounging and dining areas, a barbecue and sound system, as well as a private tennis court. Inside, you’ll find a ping-pong table for the kids, and satellite television and Wi-Fi for the grown-ups.Taking its inspiration from traditional Mexican architecture, Hacienda Magica is laid out around a central courtyard and features details such as graceful arches, beamed ceilings and intricate tile. The main living and dining areas, just off the courtyard, are bright and comfortable, with vibrant walls and artwork.There are eight bedrooms in the villa’s main house: five with king beds and three with two twin beds each. The hacienda also has three wings, each of which has one bedroom with a king bed and one bedroom with two twin beds. All fourteen bedrooms have en-suite bathrooms.Provided kayaks and paddleboards make it easy to explore the waters of Fatima Bay just in front of the villa. If you’d like to see more of the area, it’s a 5-minute drive to the Puerto Aventuras Golf & Tennis Club and a 15-minute drive to both Xpu-Ha Beach and lively Playa del Carmen. Don’t miss a visit to the Tulum ruins, 30 minutes away by car.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.Please note that this region may be affected by shifting seasonal currents and weather patterns causing an influx of seaweed at the beach.

listing.listing_description: Relish the lush serenity of a private oasis in this exquisite Moroccan villa near Marrakech. Nestled amid expansive gardens, olive groves, and stately palms yielding to Atlas Mountain vistas, the villa's alfresco living spaces set an enchanting stage for wedding receptions, special events, or intimate gatherings with loved ones. Eight bedroom suites, oustanding spa faciliites, and 800 square meters of interior living space accommodate parties of sixteen, with two stand-alone guesthouses offering privacy to couples or small families. Situated along the prestigious Route Amizmiz, Villa Zin is an easy drive from the splendors of central Marrakech and some of the country's finest golf courses.The 12,000-square-meter estate revolves around a lagoon-like swimming set between two alfresco dining areas. One features a long table and ample lounge beneath a rustic palm pavilion with gorgeous hanging lanterns and a charming dinner bell—an open-air banquet hall in a tropical glade. The second occupies the ample patio adjacent to the main house. Canopied sunbeds, elegant loungers, and a palm-strung hammock line the sparkling water, inviting you to delicious days and nights under the clear sky.A glass wall with wide threshold joins the dining patio with the main house, allowing the interior to breathe the fragrant air. Sumptuous sofas invite you to evening aperitifs overlooking the pool, while a hearth-warmed parlor and study will keep you toasty after nightfall. Separate from these living areas, the villa's spa includes a massage room, traditional Hammam, and modern, well-equipped gym enclosed by garden-view windows.The main house includes three garden-level bedrooms opening to the terrace. Warm fireplaces and traditional Moroccan decorative details such as tadelakt walls, hendira rugs, batik textiles, and Berber-inspired furnishings cast a dreamy ambiance. Each of the two stand-alone guest apartments enjoys a private entrance, furnished terrace, and sixty square meters of living space. One, known as the Shadow Pavilion, includes two bedrooms nestled amid bougainvillea. The three-bedroom Musk Pavilion is adjacent to the gym.Villa Zin blends exclusive privacy with outstanding proximity to the finest destinations in and around Marrakech. You're a short drive to Royal Golf Marrakech and Amelkis, while Jemma El Fna square in the old city's Medina quartier is a half-hour away.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Pamper yourself with aquatic options at this stylish beachfront villa on Playa Paraiso in the heart of the Riviera Maya. Sit back in the hot tub while the kids splash around in the pool. When you’re ready, step off the deck to the white sands of the beach or retreat the shade beneath one of the mature palm trees. After the beach, set out on an adventure in an underwater cave at Cenote Azul. Relax inside amongst the air conditioning and modern designer furnishings. The state of the art kitchen is sure to inspire your creative side. Pick up some fresh fish from a local market to barbecue on the terrace for taco night. The doors in the formal dining area can quickly turn the space into a refreshing alfresco setting for 8. After dinner, mix up some cocktails to sip on the terrace lounge.Turn up the sound system while you’re outside enjoying the ocean view, and let the night unfold, hopping in and out of the pool, walks along the shore, and late-night snacks on the barbecue. Rather a hangout inside? Throw the big game on the Smart TV or settle in for a family movie night. Villa Carrera comes with daily housekeeping to keep the space fresh, and there are 2 parking spaces within the gated-property.After a late breakfast, grab your camera and make the trip to Tulum Ruins, the ancient remains of the Mayan civilization. On the way home, stop in Puerto Morelos Reef National Park to try scuba diving or charter a fishing trip in town. At night, the beachfront party scene in Cancun is perfect if you feel like sipping cocktails in the sand and dancing way after the sun has gone down.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.Please note that this region may be affected by shifting seasonal currents and weather patterns causing an influx of seaweed at the beach.

listing.listing_description: All bookings with travel dates taking place after January 1st 2019, will be subject to a 4.712% General Excise Tax & a 10.25% Transient Accommodations Tax. All additional fees & all other service-related costs, will be subject to the taxes above.The spacious and luxurious Kipuka Lani is a private vacation villa created to embrace the beautiful Hawaiian environment of the Mauna Lani Estate. With four bedrooms, all with king beds and en-suite bathrooms, this villa is the perfect home for a family vacation or golf trip with friends. Located just a short walk from the course and the beach, Kipuka Lani is in a prime location, while maintaining a private and secluded atmosphere.Respect for nature has always been an important part of Hawaiian culture, and Kipuka makes it very easy to appreciate. To accentuate the fresh ocean breeze and natural sunlight of Mauna Lani, Kipuka has been designed with large openings on both sides of its open concept great room. The simple beam and post construction allows rich wooden building materials to open the massive vaulted interior space and create a warm, inviting ambience. Decorated with modern designer furniture, elegant lighting, and plenty of space to socialize, Kipuka is ideal for hosting. The kitchen is stocked with high-end appliances and a breakfast bar with seating for five. And, beside the kitchen is the formal dining area, featuring space for eight.Outside, relax under the sun in one of the furnished living areas, sun beds, or lounge chairs on the terrace. Go for an afternoon swim in the refreshing swimming pool. Later, count the stars while gathered around the fire pit, or while soaking in Kipuka’s calming hot tub. Back inside, guest will enjoy satellite television, Wi-Fi, a Sonos sound system, and air conditioning in the media room and all of the bedrooms.Within the Mauna Lani Estate, you’ll have access to their private beach club and sandy beachfront. For the athletes in your group, there’s a tennis and fitness club, also within walking distance. Mauna Lani’s two championship golf courses feature beautifully scenic and challenging holes. And, it’s the annual host of the PGA’s Hawaii State Open.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.Hawaii Tax ID #080-059-3920-01

listing.listing_description: This beautiful three-bedroom home is perched on a hill in Queenstown overlooking sublime, panoramic vistas of Lake Wakatipu and the Remarkables mountains of New Zealand's South Island. Built of fine wood in a classic alpine style, the home features luminous interiors, ample outdoor areas, and high-end amenities for cooking and entertainment. Three bedrooms sleep four guests, providing an ideal haven for families and small groups.The middle floor of this three-level home features an open-plan living area and lovely deck. Kindle a fire and enjoy a fine New Zealand wine in the lounge, and gather around the eight-person dining table for a delicious home-cooked feast. The kitchen is fully equipped with chef-grade appliances and a breakfast bar, and the deck includes an alfresco table with spectacular views of the lake and peaks.The master suite is on the top floor of the house while the guest rooms are on the bottom floor. Each bedrooms features a king bed (one is a king-split) and ensuite bathroom with stand-alone shower and tub. The master suite enjoys its own fireplace and a jetted tub in its bathroom. The twin bedroom opens to a furnished terrace, and all three rooms enjoy stunning lake and mountain views.The villa's ideal location gives you lakeside serenity and easy access to the cultural, natural, and sporting treasures of Queensland and the surrounding mountains. You're just a kilometer from downtown and Skycity Casino, and less than two kilometers from Queenstown Gardens. Golfers are minutes from Remarkable Golf Tours and an easy drive to Queenstown Golf Course, while the ski slopes of Coronet Peak and The Remarkables Ski Area are both in easy reach. With Queenstown Airport in easy reach, this vacation rental a great choice for destination wedding guests or easy weekend getaways.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Craft the perfect pie in the outdoor pizza oven while you gaze upon the rolling hillside of Tuscany at this fairy-tale farmhouse in Casole d’ Elsa. Awaken each morning to fresh country-air, fragrant gardens, and a feeling of peaceful solitude. After a family meal at the breakfast table in the chef’s kitchen, discuss sightseeing plans. Then, head out to discover Siena, Florence, and Montalcino.From the peaks of the exposed-wood ceiling to the stone-tiled floors, Pietti is a true testament to authentic Tuscan architecture. Decorated with stately furniture, four-post beds, and chandelier lighting, you’ll feel like you’ve stepped back to simpler, elegant times. Stone archways link each room and lead outside to the scenic terrace, where you can stretch out in a sun lounger beside the refreshing pool.Before dinner, pick the perfect pairing for your meal in the wine cellar. After, set the kids up with a movie in the upstairs family room. Then, throw a log on the fire, mix up a couple of bellinis, and sink into the plush sofa while chatting with old friends. Later in the night, move the party to the terrace lounge or hop into the hot tub. Daily housekeeping will refresh the villa in the morning.The nearest town, Siena, dates back to the Etruscan era with most of its growth taking place in the Middle-Ages. Today, Siena has one of the most intriguing skylines in the country. On your approach, you’ll see Torre del Mangia, the town’s highest lookout tower. The view from the top is well worth the journey, and the pictures are unbeatable. After, treat yourself to dinner at Gordon Ramsey’s Castel Monastero.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Live the quintessential Palm Springs experience at La Paloma Palms. Nestled in the highly sought after neighborhood of Vista Las Palmas, this four-bedroom villa is one of the mid-century modern masterpieces known to locals as an Alexander house. Originally constructed in 1960, La Paloma has been redefined to modern standards of luxury and its West-facing orientation presents stunning views of the San Jacinto Mountains.The villa’s outdoor spaces have the feel of a five-star resort. The sleek saline pool has both an integrated tanning shelf and spa tub. Bronze yourself under the California sun from the comfort of colorful chaise longues, or raise a sheltering parasol when the sun reaches its peak. A covered patio demonstrated the seamless integration of indoor and outdoor living. There you’ll find a living room set, perfect for easy afternoons with a book, plus a barbecue and wet bar for preparing dinner al fresco under the stars.The interior displays hallmark features of Alexander homes, including open-plan rooms, clean lines, exposed wood beam ceilings and bright, airy rooms. You and your guests will enjoy unforgettable feasts in the dining room with a unique, triple panel sliding glass door facing the pool and mountains. A gas fireplace creates a cozy ambiance in the living room where you can watch movies or premium cable on a flat screen television. Test your culinary skills in the Chef’s kitchen where state-of-the-art appliances and smooth surfaces make cooking a pleasure.Three of La Paloma’s bedrooms are found in the main house. The Master suite occupies a quiet corner. Within its spacious walls you’ll find a California King size bed, minimalist-chic décor, ample storage solutions and a large en-suite. It also opens out to a private patio. The second and third bedrooms are well-appointed with flatscreen televisions and custom blackout window treatments. The final bedroom is located in a charming, self-contained casita with kitchenette and seating area. It also houses a spa-quality en-suite.When you’re ready to explore, you can start with easy walks around the neighborhood, marveling at the local architecture. The villa is a quick drive to historic Palm Canyon Drive, known as the Palm Springs “strip”. It’s lined with a diverse mix of shops, restaurants and galleries. If you’ve come to relax, you’ll find numerous world class spas nearby, while golfers can spend memorable days teeing off on the lush fairways of world-class courses.Palm Springs Registered Tax Number: 3031Palm Springs City ID: 2308Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.
