listing.listing_description: Sway back and forth in a hammock as the sun sets at this beachfront villa in Costa Rica. Follow the lawn past the hay-thatched palapa onto your own slice of Santa Teresa Beach, where magnificent ocean views await. Or, hang back and splash around in the villa’s infinity pool. Later, walk 3-minutes into town for dinner and shopping, or drive 5-minutes to find vibrant nightlife.Casa Milya lets nature shine in its airy, open-concept interior. Showing off relaxing wood tones, pastels, and bright textiles, this beach house is the perfect complement to the gorgeous setting outside. Through ocean-framing doors, you’ll flow freely to the alfresco setting, where a rustic, yet trendy picnic table sets the perfect tone for backyard barbecues. Tall palm trees create shady spots for reading, while sunbeds are ready to help you work on your vacation tan in other areas of the terrace. Back inside, pull up a stool at the kitchen bar, mix a few tropical cocktails, and soak up the breezy vibes.Santa Teresa has excellent surfing conditions for all experience levels. If you’re a seasoned vet, Playa Santa Teresa is known for its fast, powerful breaks. If you’re a first-timer, take a lesson on Playa Hermosa, where you’ll find gentler, smaller waves to help ease you in. After, cool down with a cocktail at one of the beachfront bars on Santa Teresa’s coast.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Perched on the hillside of Alta Vista, this luxurious six bedroom retreat has an absolutely dynamic view. With a pinch of the city, a dash of the bay, and a generous helping of the ocean, Villa Lucia captures unique vantage points of beautiful Puerto Vallarta. This area is well-known for its adventure tourism, sandy beaches, and vibrant city nightlife, making it ideal for an exciting family getaway.Merging indoor and outdoor space is a key element of Lucia’s serene environment. Fresh ocean breeze and natural sunlight flows easily throughout the interior spaces thanks to wide opening on the terrace. The interior decor is bright and cheerful, with plenty of natural wood and colourful local art. The fully equipped kitchen features plenty of functional workspace on its granite countertops and centre island. At dinner, the formal dining area has space for eight guests. If you’re feeling a little more casual, there’s a barbecue on the terrace and lots of space to dine alfresco.Spend your afternoon relaxing in the balmy tropical weather from Lucia’s private terraces. Take a refreshing dip in the cliffside infinity pool. Enjoy the outdoor living spaces, lounge chairs, and ocean view. Back inside, enjoy perks like satellite television, a sound system, Wi-Fi, filtered water, and an exercise room.Lucia features two master bedrooms with king sized beds. There are two more bedrooms in the main house with a pair of queen beds and two bedrooms in a separate casita with king size beds. Each bedroom has an en-suite and an incredible ocean view.Fifteen minutes away, walking, you’ll find Puerto Vallarta’s most vibrant beach, Los Muertos. A popular spot among tourists and locals, this sandy stretch is known for its crystal clear waters and vibrant atmosphere. A little further and you’ll be in downtown Puerto Vallarta. If there’s a golfer in the group, Marina Vallarta Golf Club is beautifully scenic course, perfect for an afternoon trip.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Find the perfect pairing of private house and five-star amenities at Tradewinds. A holiday at this luxury estate gives you attentive service by a full staff and access to the Half Moon Resort—all in a beautiful residence with five bedrooms. Reserve this Montego Bay vacation rental for a relaxed family gathering or a golf getaway with friends.Your stay at Tradewinds includes the services of a chef, butler, housekeeper and even a chauffeur for week-long trips. After your arrival, you’ll be greeted with Club Mobay VIP service and whisked to the villa on a complimentary airport transfer. Once at the estate, the infinity pool, outdoor lounging and dining areas, al-fresco wet bar and barbecue are all yours to enjoy. There’s also an Apple TV, Sonos sound system, foosball table and Wi-Fi.Take in views over the golf course to the coast of Jamaica from breezily sophisticated living and dining rooms inside the villa. Dark-wood furniture and roll-arm sofas add refinement to the open-concept space, while tropical prints are a playful touch. Though chef service is included in your stay, there is a fully equipped kitchen.There are three bedrooms in the villa’s main house and two in a cottage; all five have en-suite bathrooms. In the main house, you’ll find two bedrooms with king beds and one bedroom with a queen bed. Both cottage bedrooms have king beds and al-fresco showers, making it perfect as a honeymoon-style retreat for a couple or a quiet spot for a family traveling with younger children.Golfers, rejoice: a stay at Tradewinds even includes complimentary membership to the Half Moon, White Witch and Cinnamon Hill golf courses—some of the best on Jamaica. Everyone else can relax by the pools and hot tub, check out the tennis courts and putting green, or order cocktails from the beach butlers at nearby Half Moon Resort.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: This incredible slope side chalet allows you to experience everything Breckenridge has to offer – year round. Set at the base of Peak 8, this private condominium is just steps from the gondola that takes you to the ski slopes or right into town. Come experience the great outdoors in Colorado in an environment filled with almost unlimited options suitable for guests of all ages. Whether for a holiday or a honeymoon, book your stay at One Ski Hill 8413!During your stay at this vacation rental, you can spend time in the lobby with a large, three-sided fireplace or relax in the grand piano living room. The outdoor plaza seats up to 300 guests with a heated deck and fireplace. The aquatics center features an adult pool, children’s pool, indoor and outdoor hot tubs, sauna and steam room. Why not let the children bowl a few games at the two-lane alley while you visit the Rejuvenation Center for a soothing massage? One Ski Hill also features an exercise room, two movie lounges and a games room.This spacious condo has been beautifully appointed with distinctive, modern finishes. The kitchen features stainless steel Bosch appliances, a wine fridge and granite counter tops. Enjoy a meal in the formal dining area or a snack at the breakfast bar. Entertaining your group is easy in the living area where guests can warm up by the fireplace, read a book or watch television.The three comfortable bedrooms accommodate up to seven guests at this non-smoking villa. The master suite offers a king bed, gas fireplace, sitting area and flat screen television. The second bedroom has a queen bed as well as a sitting area and flat screen television. Ideal for the children, the third bedroom has a captain’s bunk, a flat screen television and an Xbox 360 game system.While winters bring some of the best skiing opportunities to Breckenridge, summer activities at the Peak 8 Fun Park include the Gold Runner Coaster, the Alpine SuperSlide, miniature golf, bungee trampolines and a rock climbing wall. Your reservation also includes a free shuttle that will take you and your family anywhere in town for dining, shopping and nightlife. You’ll also find the Breckenridge Golf Club just a few minutes away.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Modern Oasis is a stunning example of the mid-century modern design that turned a once sleepy town into the desert playground of the rich and famous. The spacious three-bedroom home is located in the much-coveted Las Palmas neighborhood and has been thoughtfully reinterpreted to meet the high standards of today’s discerning guests. The home’s sharp angles and its tall, verdant privacy hedges stand out against a rugged backdrop of the San Jacinto Mountains.Stellar indoor and outdoor amenities are seamlessly integrated and compete for your attention. Verdant grass connects the many conversation areas around the pool terrace. A long covered patio shelters an al fresco dining table and living room set. Cool off with a dip in the pool before laying in a hammock or chaise longue to resume work on your tan. A custom wet bar and barbecue provide a cozy venue for preparing a holiday feast. As dusk settles, head for the bubbling grotto spa which fits up to twelve people.Enter the home through any of the floor-to-ceiling sliding glass door and you’ll encounter spacious, bright rooms with cool, natural stone floors and exposed wood beam ceilings. A lively minimalist-chic aesthetic is applied in the great room. The living room is anchored by a stacked stone fire place. Enjoy films and premium cable on the flatscreen television while you relax on a modern sectional sofa. Perfect your culinary skills in the gourmet kitchen as you prepare memorable meals on high-end appliances. Guests can watch you work from the breakfast bar before dinner is served in the formal dining room.The Master suite is found in a tranquil corner of the villa. It houses a California King size bed, entertainment unit and a well-appointed en-suite spa. The Master suite also leads out to a private patio with an in-ground spa; perfect for moonlight soaks. The second and third bedrooms are also large and well lit. They feature ample closet space and share a bathroom with a combination shower/soak tub.Palm Springs is the perfect destination for those seeking outdoor adventure or rest and relaxation. The villa is just blocks from downtown, where you’ll find upscale shops, restaurants and nightlife. The Coachella Valley is a golfer’s dream, as it’s home to over 80 courses, amid breathtaking scenery. Hikers of all levels will enjoy trails in the surrounding hills and national parks.Palm Springs Registered Tax Number: 3031Palm Springs City ID: 1495Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Overlooking the beautiful sandy beach of Baie Rouge, this stately hillside villa offers breathtaking ocean views from all three of its king en-suite bedrooms. Perfect for an elegant island getaway, villa Beaulieu is adorned with the highest end amenities, sure to satisfy the most discerning luxury travelers. Nearby, you’ll love exploring the many secluded beachfront coves, exciting fusion restaurants, and duty-free shopping in Marigot.Beaulieu’s white walls, spacious vaulted-ceilings, terracotta floors, and wide archways to the patio display all the classic stylings of a Caribbean beach house. Mix that with state of the art appliances and electronics, and you’ve got an unbeatable destination for your next amazing Luxury Retreat. The vibrant greens of mature palm trees and glowing turquoise ocean views are the focal points of Beaulieu’s every room. You’ll love the feeling the of the fresh ocean breeze, and the warmth of natural sunlight flowing through the interior spaces, drawing you out to Saint Martin’s breathtaking environment.Once inside Beaulieu’s electric gates, you’ll appreciate the incredible amount of privacy on the estate’s beautifully landscaped, ocean-view patio. You’ll appreciate the outdoor doing and lounge areas, equipped with mosquito traps to keep unwanted visitors away. The heated pool is the perfect place for a quick dip when you don’t feel like hitting the beach. Inside, satellite television, a sound system, and air conditioning will satisfy your tech needs. And, the villa comes with daily housekeeping, a caretaker, and onsite maintenance for anything that may pop up.The nearest beaches to villa Beaulieu are Baie Rouge, Plum Bay, Cupecoy, and Mullet Bay, all of which are between three and five minutes from home. After you’ve spent a few days enjoying the sand and surf, head into the town of Marigot, known for its duty-free shopping, nightlife, and exciting fusion cuisine. Marigot is the French capital of the island, so you’ll find plenty of quaint cafes and bakeries, as well as fine dining. If you’d prefer to dine-in, pick up something fresh from the Creole Market, and make us of that barbecue on the terrace.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Relax in a quintessential Napa and Sonoma estate at Knights Valley Vista. This spectacular vacation rental has it all: dramatic views of the landscape and vineyards, luxury amenities, magazine-worthy style and a charmingly rural location just outside the town of Calistoga. Plan your California wine country escape with a group of up to eight friends or family members.Knights Valley Vista sits on more than 200 private acres overlooking Mt. St. Helena, lined with seven miles of hiking paths that meander through vineyards of Cabernet Sauvignon, Malbec and Chardonnay. The grounds also feature a swimming pool, hot tub, bocce court, lounging and dining areas, a barbecue and a firepit. For your evening entertainment, there’s a satellite TV, Sonos sound system and Wi-Fi.Designed for indoor-outdoor living that takes full advantage of the gorgeous setting, the villa is laid out around an expansive open-concept great room. Here, stone walls frame the living area, dining area, and fully equipped kitchen, and several sets of doors lead to the outdoor areas. A recent renovation added luxe finishes such as marble countertops and intricate tilework.The main house at Knights Valley Vista has a honeymoon-worthy master bedroom with a king bed, en-suite bedroom, fireplace and private access to the terrace with the hot tub. The other two bedrooms are in a guest house; one has a king bed and en-suite bathroom, and the other has a queen bed and shared access to a hall bathroom. For larger parties, an office in the main house has a queen Murphy bed.While you could easily spend your holiday simply exploring the villa’s grounds, it’s well worth taking a drive to nearby towns. Knights Valley Vista is less than a 5-mile drive from Calistoga, and less than a 20-mile drive from both Oakville and Santa Rosa. Leave time to stop off at the wineries you pass along the way—or to simply pause and take in the views.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Swing above the pool in a sunbed while gazing out over the lush canopy of Bali’s southern tip. Embrace a relaxing, Bohemian lifestyle at this open-air hilltop home with a full-staff on-hand to make your vacation a breeze. Watch the sunset from the green-rooftop patio or the shady pergola on the opposite side of the pool. At night, drive into Kuta for dinner, shopping, and beachfront bars.Villa Moso is artistic, unique, and architecturally-one with its beautiful surroundings, all at the same time. Flow from inside to out, barrier-free with numerous floor-to-ceiling openings. Explore the interior, and you’ll find pieces of art, furniture, and design traits that will inevitably come up during dinner conversation. After you’ve eaten, whip up a few cocktails at the kitchen’s marble bar and shoot a round of pool while you sip. On quieter evenings, curl up for a good movie in the media room or keep up with your fitness routine in the home gym. After a workout, treat yourself to a few minutes in the sauna.Start your morning with a stroll along the beach, which you’ll find several within a 20-minute drive. Let the waves inspire you and sign-up for a surfing lesson on Kuta or Dreamland beach; both are favorites among local surfers. If surfing’s not your style, check out Pasir Putih for a snorkeling class, or, relax on the sand with a tropical juice from one of the beach bars.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Plan your Arizona holiday in a home custom-built for entertaining at Cholla. Its thoughtfully designed outdoor areas, finely detailed interiors and six bedrooms make this Scottsdale vacation rental perfect for a desert getaway or family gathering with groups of up to twelve. Spend your stay relaxing at this luxury property or taking advantage of several nearby golf courses.Cholla's outdoor living spaces have everything you'll need to enjoy the hot, sunny days and cooler evenings, from a pool surrounded by sun loungers, covered patio and high-pressure mist system to a barbecue, living and dining areas with an al-fresco fireplace, and a hot tub.Vaulted ceilings, pale wood floors crafted from Siberian oak and neutral tones give the villa's interiors an airy yet refined appeal. The heart of the residence is an open-plan great room with a sitting area, fully equipped kitchen, breakfast bar and breakfast nook, all connected to the terrace. A separate formal dining area has its own bar area, and a separate media room is a more intimate space to watch TV or a movie.There are five bedrooms in the main house at Cholla: three with king beds and private en-suite bathrooms, one with two double beds and access to a hall bathroom, and one with a twin bunk bed. The property also has a separate guest house that's the perfect in-law retreat, family suite or even honeymoon-style escape, with a queen bed, twin bunk bed, and a full kitchen and living area.With its sunny skies and array of challenging courses, Scottsdale is the ideal place to lower your handicap-and with four courses within a 10-mile drive of Cholla, it's easy. Practice a different kind of swing at the nearby Camelback Village Racquet and Health Club or take a hike through Echo Canyon Recreation Area. For shopping, dining and more, make the short drive to downtown Scottsdale or take a day trip into Phoenix.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Put yourself only steps from the slopes at Argentiere 341. Part of the Chateau Chamonix complex, this newly renovated vacation rental offers ski-in, ski-out access to the Steamboat gondola and is within easy reach of shared amenities. Its open-plan living area and three spacious bedrooms are perfect for a getaway with friends or a relaxed family holiday in Steamboat Springs.Guests of Argentiere 341 are welcome to use the shared pool, hot tub, barbecues and fitness center at Chateau Chamonix, as well as the communal ski storage. For quiet evenings in after a day on the slopes, the villa has its own private space with a TV, Wi-Fi and a cozy fireplace.Vaulted ceilings and large windows give the villa’s open-plan great room a bright, airy feel, while a stone fireplace surround is a dramatic focal point. Stretch out on the sectional in front of the TV, seat up to eight around the dining table to relive the day’s adventures, or pause for a quick snack at the breakfast bar in the fully equipped gourmet kitchen.There are two bedrooms with en-suite bathrooms at this luxury property: a master suite with a king bed and its own balcony, and a second bedroom with a queen bed. The third bedroom has two twin beds and shared access to a hall bathroom.Not only does Argentiere 341 offer ski-in, ski-out access to the Steamboat gondola, but a shuttle service is included during all winter stays, making it easy to get to the slopes—or your après-ski activities. In warmer weather, make the 5-minute trip for a round at Rollingstone Ranch Golf Course. Be sure to leave time to visit some of Colorado’s natural wonders: the family-friendly Steamboat Springs Old Town, or the honeymoon-worthy hot springs in Strawberry Park.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Just a short stroll from beautiful downtown Ketchum and the Sun Valley Resort, this private four bedroom has the perfect location for a secluded family getaway while enjoying quick and easy access to shopping, dining, nightlife, and skiing. Within an eight-minute drive, you’ll have access to world-class skiing at Sun Valley Lodge, Bald Mountain, and Dollar Mountain. If you’re traveling in the warmer month, Elkhorn Golf Club is just nine minutes from home. And, there’s plenty more to discover in Sun Valley, no matter what time of the year you’re vacationing.This sleek and stylish villa puts a modern spin on the traditional ski lodge with its clean straight lines, open concept floor plan, and bright, elegant white interior color scheme. The living room is adorned with state of the electronics, designer furnishings, and gorgeous stone mantle with a wood burning fireplace. The vaulted ceiling is extra-high, and the walls underneath are made up of forest view framing glass, setting a warm and inviting tone in the living room that you and your guests will love.Bitterroot is the perfect host for family dinner, with formal and alfresco dining for eight, a fully equipped kitchen with a breakfast bar, dishwasher, and barbecue. After your meal, curl up with a good book by the fireplace or settle in for a family movie night in the media room. If you’ve still got some energy to burn, head over to the Sun Valley Lodge, where you’ll have complimentary use of their swimming pool, jacuzzi, and sauna.After you’ve spent some time on the slopes or at one of the nearby golf clubs, reward yourself with a night on the town. Downtown Ketchum, just a four-minute walk from home, has a wide range of dining options, from fine French, Italian, and American restaurants to casual pubs. If you feel like catching one of the latest movies, Magic Lantern Cinemas is delightful old-old-style theatre, great for family outings. And, if you’d like to explore even more of Idaho’s breathtaking environment, Sawtooth National Forest is a great afternoon excursion.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Villa Gilda is a beautiful villa set in a peaceful and rural location near the baroque town of Noto, an idyllic base for exploring the rural south-east coast of Sicily.A modern structure made of pale, local stone, the villa sits gracefully on a hillside overlooking olive groves which stretch to the coast. The garden has been landscaped to enhance the surroundings, incorporating olive trees and traditional stone walls with palms, cactus and a smooth green lawn. Guests are encouraged to enjoy outside living to the full. You can help yourself to fruit and vegetables grown in the garden, cool off in the inviting pool, have a siesta on a sun lounger and dine together under a pergola.The uncluttered interiors of Villa Gilda have a clean, modern finish throughout with carefully chosen furniture and furnishings in a neutral colour palette of contemporary grey, white and beige. The living space is on the ground floor with a modern kitchen and a comfortable living room which opens out to the terrace, furnished with an outside sofa and chairs. Downstairs there are three bedrooms, each with their own bathroom and french windows opening out to the garden.Despite its rural location, Villa Gilda is just 10 minutes drive from the baroque town of Noto with its shops, restaurants and attractive historic centre. Enjoyable day trips include visiting the fishing village of Marzamemi, exploring nearby sandy beaches and visiting the Vendicari nature reserve, known for its flamingos.

listing.listing_description: An infinity pool laps at the terrace at this villa in a gated community at Las Terrenas. Clean-lined architecture clad in creamy stone is the backdrop to 360-degree panoramas of lush hills and the Atlantic Ocean. It’s a 10-minute walk through the quiet residential neighborhood to a sandy beach, or a 10-minute drive down a private access road to bars and restaurants by the water. Caribbean sunshine floods outdoor living spaces with an infinity pool and loungers, but there are also shaded al-fresco sitting areas, as well as a barbecue and a dining table for 8. Find your new favorite rum by mixing cocktails at the indoor wet bar, keep up with your favorite shows on the Apple TV, and share photos of your holiday with friends and family at home via Wi-Fi. Floor-to-ceiling glass and slide-away walls connect the indoor great room to the outdoor living spaces—and show off the ocean views, too. White sofas and a blond-wood dining table lend the ambience of a luxury spa to the living and dining areas, and the adjacent kitchen is fully equipped. For your comfort, this vacation rental also has ceiling fans and air conditioning. Villa Elroca has 4 bedrooms with king beds and one bedroom with a queen bed; all 5 bedrooms have en-suite bathrooms and ocean views. Like the great room, the bedrooms have a monochromatic look that creates a restful feel, with plenty of pale stone and blond wood. The Dominican Republic is known for white-sand beaches right out of a honeymoon ad, and a stay at Villa Elroca puts you just a 10-minute walk from the nearest one. You can also choose to walk to the community’s 3 tennis courts or drive to downtown Las Terrenas to check out locally owned restaurants or socialize at the waterfront bars. Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.
